import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import {Form, Button, Navbar, Offcanvas, Nav, NavDropdown} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import {LinkContainer} from 'react-router-bootstrap' import ProductsContext from './context/ProductsContext' const Search = () => { const { setProducts, currentCustomer} = useContext(ProductsContext) const navigate = useNavigate() const [formData, setFormData] = useState( { search_term: " " } ) async function searchItem(event){ event.preventDefault(); if(formData.search_term === " "){ alert("Enter a search term") }else{ navigate('/loading') let response = await fetch("/search", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify(formData) }) if(response.ok){ let data = await response.json(); console.log(data) setProducts([...data]) } formData.search_term = " " } } function handleChange(event){ setFormData({...formData, [event.target.name]: event.target.value}) } if(currentCustomer){ return(

Customer

Customer
Home Search history
) }else{ return (
{currentCustomer ? (

Customer

) : (

Shopcrawl

)} Shopcrawl
Home Link
) } } export default Search
